channel.title: [non-Steam] Clip-through with fence in Surface Tension after Gargantua battle.
channel.description:
Hello team,
playing in the non-Steam version of Black Mesa: Source it is possible to clip out of an area in the chapter Surface Tension. After the Gargantua battle with the air strike tower ([url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645890[/url]), I was looking how to progress further.
[code]> status map : bm_c2a5g at: 1058 x, 6091 y, -39 z > getpos setpos 1058.655396 6091.500000 -39.150352;setang 10.052700 -18.087234 0.000000[/code] I saw a couple barrels in the water and figured I could stack them up to get past the fence ([url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645801[/url]). I jumped on those barrels and crouched through the gap. After that, I arrived at a corner which I also tried to jump through ([url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645856[/url]). There is no way to get out of that clip anymore.
I'll look for a different way to progress. :p

item.title: [non-Steam] Clip-through with fence in Surface Tension after Gargantua battle.
item.dc:creator: oraysiru_no_sound
item.description:
Hello team,

playing in the non-Steam version of Black Mesa: Source it is possible to clip out of an area in the chapter Surface Tension. After the Gargantua battle with the air strike tower (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645890), I was looking how to progress further.

[code]> status
map : bm_c2a5g at: 1058 x, 6091 y, -39 z

getpos
setpos 1058.655396 6091.500000 -39.150352;setang 10.052700 -18.087234 0.000000[/code]
I saw a couple barrels in the water and figured I could stack them up to get past the fence (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645801). I jumped on those barrels and crouched through the gap. After that, I arrived at a corner which I also tried to jump through (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=590645856). There is no way to get out of that clip anymore.

Iâ€™ll look for a different way to progress.
